Content: Really love this app. I've been using it for over a year and it's a great way to remind yourself to take pills and complete routine tasks throughout the day. It's a very stable and reliable app. No crashes, no bugs, no ads. Wish all apps worked this well. Thanks Habit Tracker.
Been using it for a few week now, your app is an excellent helper to improve my laziness ^^ cant wait for u to develop for ios and would to have sync up account....last update got app crashed problem
Not working since last update. Crashes and widgets dont work. Literally unusable.

PROS- Practical without the pimped-out pointless fluff. PULL- Additional widget features give it the edge over the competition. CONS- A few crashes with the widgets on home screen (unable to disable habit) Nothing too detrimental , usually a phone restart fixes it.
Hey , Unfortunately it crashes in mi redmi note 4. Pls can you fix this. Or provide me a soln
I imported my Rewire data and then it just crashes on me. Can't use it at all.
So many goofld & helpful This is very good app on Android device and so much helpful because of charts and diagrams...but some crash accure in my phone (htc one E8)... Pleads fix it

SUGGESTION - STREAK FREEZE There's this feature on the language app Duolingo called a Streak Freeze. It's a feature that has been heavily been the reason why I have been learning for over 300 days. I would strongly recommend you look into it and try to find a way to implement it.

Probably the most important app on my phone This app makes it so simple to figure out if you are doing the things you want to be doing. Do I wish it had a web interface to match? Sure, but it's not strictly necessary. The app has never crashed and does the job well. I love the statistics for each habit.
Loving it. Just keep crashing lately, need help
Love it Crash was fixed extremely promptly! I'd still like an option for the old plain checkmark widgets, but hey. Utterly wonderful app.
Very handy for habit tracking, straight to the point & never crashes
